comment.author: 97381978@N00
comment._content:
Looks like an R.E.8 or the similar B.E.2/B.E.12.

The R.E.8 was known by the Cockney Rhyming expression 'Harry Tate' after a popular music hall performer of the time.

comment.author: 22549616@N00
comment._content: Judging from the splintered prop this is the result of a heavy landing.
